meanings.definition: Relating to or forming the lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: The dentist examined the dentary area of the patient's jaw.
meanings.sent2: The dentary bone helps in chewing food.
meanings.sent3: The dentary smile of the cartoon character made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her dentary strength in handling tough situations impressed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The dentary shape of the puzzle piece fit perfectly into the gap.

meanings.sent1: The dentary is crucial for the movement of the jaw.
meanings.sent2: The dentist pointed out the fractured dentary in the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The dentary bone in the museum's exhibit looked ancient and fascinating.
meanings.sent4: His dentary was sore after the long singing performance.
meanings.sent5: The dentary of the dinosaur skeleton was massive and intimidating.
